author: Kingdonfin
title: Bionicle: Maze of Shadows
review:
Well its review time again. Many people dislike games that include the Toa Metru but I don't. This is a very fun game. I have clocked it but I still play it.

PROS

* You can play as 6 Toa
* You get new disks and abilities

CONS

* Kind of old now
* GBA not DS
* A bit annoying

OVERALL

Well, this game is fun but when you get stuck it is annoying so I give it a 3/5. : )
